title: Tiropitakia (Little cheese pies)
ingredients: ['1 (250g) pack butter, room temperature', '1 (200g) tub Greek yoghurt, like Total', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '375g self-raising flour', 'Filling', '275g crumbled feta cheese', '1 egg, beaten', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 egg, beaten']
